DEARBORN PUBLIC SCHOOLS
4 8 2 4 LOIS, DEARBORN, MICHIGAN 48126
582-D441
School Relations
MARION CORWELL, ASSOCIATE: DIRECTOR
January 26, 1965
Mr. Harold E. Hill, Vice-President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
13^6 Connecticut Avenue
Washington, D. C. 20036
Dear Harold,
Thank you for your letter of January 22.
Our public relations committee -was pursuing the speakers
guide project at the direction of Bill Harley. He suggested
a year or two ago that our committee work on a published
NAEB speakers guide and it has taken this long to begin to
get it off the ground. Evidentally in the intervening time
you people have changed your minds about the necessity of
this type of booklet. If so, we will discontinue the
project.
Sincerely,
Marion Corwell
Associate Director
MC/hjk
cc: Lee Campion
